ygData.subject: Re: patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour   question
ygData.msgSnippet: 3 weeks ah, I think Kenven using 10 hrs to gain to lvl 8 DE warrior. Anyway I believe with previous experience it s much easier to gain lvl if u create a 2nd
ygData.messageBody:
3 weeks ah, I think Kenven using 10 hrs to gain to lvl 8 DE warrior.
Anyway I believe with previous experience it's much easier to gain lvl if
u create a 2nd char of the same class. That's my experience when creating
my 2nd wiz in Prexus.

On Wednesday, June 23, 1999 2:00 PM, Yap Sieh Roy
[SMTP:sryap@...] wrote:
> From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
>
> ahh ..
> i spent 3 weeks to reach lvl 8 leh... btw, i'm working, so i can only log
in
> at late nite usually after 12midnite. maybe that's y there's no pple in
the
> innnoruk server.
> fennin and veeshan is loaded with pple at that time...
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 1:28 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced leather
armour
> question
>
>
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >
> > Cazic Thule/Veeshan/Rallos Zek are the 3 most porpular servers, when
the
> fish
> > did Fenin Fo get there?
> >
> > I'm warning you, get over to Innoruuk or you'r dead meat. Besides, in
> those
> > servers, most of the people are ABOVE level 20, so the level 1-20 area
are
> VERY
> > dry. Prexus would be a good place to be if you want more people to be
with
> you
> >
> > Level 8 is a low level, if I can give up a level 36 enchanter, I can't
see
> why
> > you can't give up a level 8 warrior
> >
> > As a conculsion, get to Innoruuk in A WEEK or you MUST send us YOUR
> ADDRESS.
> > Prepare for a surprise.
> >
> > Yap Sieh Roy wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
> > >
> > > aiya..
> > >
> > > more pple more shiok mah!!
> > > fennin and veeshan always got close to 1000 players online ..
> > > innoruk got around 600 only ??
> > >
> > > roy

got

> kena
> > > > chopped issit? ;)
> > > >
> > > > Now most impt is to get my wiz to lvl 16 and get the invis spell
> first.
> > > > W/o it my butt kena kicked until sored. Last night I'm hunting
derv
> > > > alone, sharing kills with another 2 group of lvl 10-12 players.
Seem
> like
> > > > good xp there, but down time kinda long coz I used up at least 80%
of
> my
> > > > mana for every kill ;( Other groups kill 2 b4 I can kill 1, sigh.
> > > >
> > > > Ziltus

> > > > > > > hi,
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > been trying to practise my tailoring skillz.. i got a couple
of
> > > > > questions
> > > > > > > abt making armour, hope u guys can help.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > ruined pelt + pattern = patchwork armour
> > > > > > > medium pelt + studs + pattern = studded armour
> > > > > > > hi-quality pelt + file + pattern = reinforced armour
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > the above is as far as i understand from the tailoring book.
> there
> > > is
> > > > > only 2
> > > > > > > slots in the sewing kit so.patchwork is no problem but what
> about
> > > > > studded
> > > > > > > and reinforced where 3 items are required? what is the
sequence
> of
> > > > > making
> > > > > > > them ?
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > thanks !
> > > > > > > roy
